HiddenText.Name: I / The Pathway student missed the appointment. What do I do?
HiddenText.OpenningText: I / The Pathway student missed the appointment. What do I do?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Do everything in your power to reschedule the appointment. If you still can’t get together, send an email to the Speaking Partner managers explaining who missed the appointment and why. They will give this information to the instructor, who will decide how to assign points.
